reviews.body:
## Pull request overview

This PR replaces placeholder AHTC (Anti-Holographic Tensor Compression) stubs with a production SVD-based tensor compression implementation. The core compression algorithm uses singular value decomposition with adaptive truncation to achieve compression while maintaining quantum state fidelity above specified thresholds.

**Key changes:**
- Implemented entropy-based compression pipeline with SVD decomposition, adaptive truncation, and fidelity-preserving reconstruction
- Integrated compression capabilities into TensorNetworkEngine, MultiQubitSimulator, StateVector, and Simulator classes
- Added 21 comprehensive tests for compression correctness, fidelity guarantees, deterministic behavior, and performance targets

### Reviewed changes

Copilot reviewed 6 out of 6 changed files in this pull request and generated 14 comments.

<details>
<summary>Show a summary per file</summary>

| File | Description |
| ---- | ----------- |
| `quasim/holo/anti_tensor.py` | Core compression implementation with entropy spectrum computation, SVD-based decomposition, adaptive truncation, and compress/decompress pipeline |
| `tests/holo/test_anti_tensor_impl.py` | Comprehensive test suite with 21 tests covering reconstruction error, entropy reduction, deterministic replay, compression ratios, and fidelity guarantees |
| `quasim/qc/quasim_tn.py` | TensorNetworkEngine integration with compress_state() and load_compressed_state() methods |
| `quasim/qc/quasim_multi.py` | MultiQubitSimulator integration with checkpoint_state() and restore_checkpoint() for persistent storage |
| `qratum_ai_platform/core/statevector.py` | StateVector compression API with compress() method and CompressedStateVector class |
| `qratum_ai_platform/core/simulator.py` | Simulator integration with run_with_compression() for memory-efficient circuit execution |

**Critical Issues Found:**
1. **Incorrect fidelity calculation** in adaptive_truncate (line 310) - squares the fidelity target incorrectly, leading to overly aggressive compression
2. **Misleading compression ratio** (line 538) - only counts singular values without accounting for U/Vh matrix storage, making ratios artificially high
3. **Incorrect mutual information** estimation (lines 149-155) - concatenation-based joint entropy is mathematically wrong

**Moderate Issues:**
- Missing test coverage for all integration methods (compress_state, checkpoint_state, run_with_compression)
- Potentially problematic npz serialization of nested dictionaries with arrays
- Unclear API with union return types and overly permissive parameter types
- Global random seed modification can affect user code
- Periodic compression doesn't actually reduce memory as intended
</details>

title: Replace AHTC placeholder stubs with production SVD-based tensor compression
